name: Repressed (itch)
description:
Repressed is a short, experimental, maze-puzzle game about exploring the mind in the wake of a tragedy. The player must traverse the dangers of a broken mind and discover what memories they may have hidden away.
Completed in two weeks as part of a college module, Repressed explores an interesting view of in game physics and movement.
The game is still very much in development, so any bugs discovered should be reported to the creator, with much appreciation!

Controls:

Invert Gravity- E

Stick to Surface- Left click(on crosshair, short range)

Shift- Speed Boost(EDIT: Avoid using when possible as recent tests have shown it causes some bugs occasionally)
